github_body:
Map changes:
    * #441 Shadowlands preparation of adding Inspiring enemies.
    * #443 Prideful affix is now supported in Shadowlands dungeons.
Mapping changes:
    * #446 The Necrotic Wake (Shadowlands Dungeon) has been mapped and is now available as a preview!
    * #442 Added tooling for adding NPCs for new expansions in an easier way.
Bugfixes:
    * #445 Creating a new pull will no longer create a second ghost pull in the sidebar.
discord_body:
v3.5 (2020/09/09)(https://keystone.guru/release/v3.5)
Map changes:
    * #441 Shadowlands preparation of adding Inspiring enemies.
    * #443 Prideful affix is now supported in Shadowlands dungeons.

Mapping changes:
    * #446 The Necrotic Wake (Shadowlands Dungeon) has been mapped and is now available as a preview!
    * #442 Added tooling for adding NPCs for new expansions in an easier way.

Bugfixes:
    * #445 Creating a new pull will no longer create a second ghost pull in the sidebar.
reddit_body:
[https://keystone.guru/release/v3.5](https://keystone.guru/release/v3.5)

Map changes:
* [\#441](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/441) Shadowlands preparation of adding Inspiring enemies.
* [\#443](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/443) Prideful affix is now supported in Shadowlands dungeons.

Mapping changes:
* [\#446](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/446) The Necrotic Wake (Shadowlands Dungeon) has been mapped and is now available as a preview!
* [\#442](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/442) Added tooling for adding NPCs for new expansions in an easier way.

Bugfixes:
* [\#445](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/445) Creating a new pull will no longer create a second ghost pull in the sidebar.

changes.change: Shadowlands preparation of adding Inspiring enemies.
Prideful affix is now supported in Shadowlands dungeons.
The Necrotic Wake (Shadowlands Dungeon) has been mapped and is now available as a preview!
Added tooling for adding NPCs for new expansions in an easier way.
Creating a new pull will no longer create a second ghost pull in the sidebar.
